#summary JON parser in grin

{{{
<element>{
  Either{
    Accept '&'
    Name=<name>
    Either{
      Accept '=' <s>
      Value=<object>
      Registry.store(registry, name,value)
    }or{
      Value=registry.retrieve(registry,name)
    }
  }or{
    Value=<object>
  }
  Return value
}
<object>{
  Could Type=<classcast>
  Either{
    Is not type
    Value=<unknown>
  } or value = <value>
  Return value
}
<class cast>{
  Accept'('
  Either{
    Accept '&'
    Name=<name>
    Either{
      Accept '=' <s>
      Value=<class>
      Registry.store(registry, name,value)
    }or{
      Value=registry.retrieve(registry,name)
    }
  }or{
    Value=<class>
  }
  #check that value is assignable to type?
  Accept')'
  Return value
}
<unknown>{
  Either value=<unknown map>
  Or value=<unknown list>
  Or value=<primitive>
  Return value
}
<value>{
  Either{
    Is Map.assignablefrom(type)
    Value=<map>
  } or {
     #etc.
  }
  Return value
}
